Description:
RENOVATERS DELIGHT
This solid brick, single front terrace presents a wonderful opportunity for transformation, taking advantage of its size, potential and central position. Comfortable as is, it could be updated and reconfigured to create a fabulous family home. Featuring good size bedrooms with OFP's, arched hallway, formal lounge, kitchen/meals, floor boards, north facing rear yard and ROW access. Local amenities include walking distance to Clifton Hill Train station, MCG, Yarra Bend Park and the Eastern Freeway.
Thomson (Carlton and Brunswick) Pty Ltd
Jason Sharpe : 0438 847 700

Description:
Exceptional Assets
$620,000 - $670,000
Compact, carefree and stylish - the epitome of historic Clifton Hill - and perfectly adapted to today's lifestyles. Now into its second century but showing no sign of ageing, this 3 bedroom single fronted brick cottage has been superbly transformed by a hidden second storey addition.
Behind a picket fence, the home includes hallmark glass leadlights, timber fretwork, high ceilings and polished Baltic pine floorboards. Of the 3 well proportioned bedrooms, the upstairs rear bedroom must be the favourite with its cathedral ceiling and full of light from ample windows. It is above the bright and charming open plan kitchen-living room which features timber cupboards and stainless steel appliances. Its double doors open to a delightful compact courtyard - think of an outdoor room designed for winter sun and summer shade - with sheltered decks around a garden (with a rainwater tank). Also features outstanding period style bathroom with claw foot bath and separate powder room, useful storage, gas ducted heating and gate access to the rear ROW.
In one of this coveted neighbourhood's quietest streets, this inner urban home is close all public transport, Yarra Bend parkland, Abbotsford Convent Arts precinct, Collingwood Childrens Farm and fresh food market as well as the delights of Clifton Hill, Northcote, Fitzroy and Carlton shopping and entertainment precincts.
* Charming Federation era brick cottage
* Delightfully updated and extended
* 3 spacious bedrooms (1 upstairs)
* Excellent quality fittings and finishes
* Private rear courtyard, door to ROW
Land 6.10m x 25.91m - 158 sq m approx.
Terms 10% deposit, balance 30/45 days
Get photos and details to your mobile now
SMS the property ID 388980to 0428 796 786 Standard SMS charges apply.

Description:
SUPERB PARK-SIDE POSITION
From its elevated situation set back from the corner of Caroline and Yambla Street this bright top floor apartment enjoys immediate proximity to the spectacular expanses of Quarries Park, a green belt of wide open space and wonderful recreation options on the city edge.
Clifton Hill station and great local cafes further complement a fantastic first home buyer opportunity in a consistently coveted pocket that combines the very best of both CBD fringe convenience and relaxing park-side serenity
The apartment's light-filled living/dining area is accompanied by an efficient galley corner kitchen and the all day natural light delivered by north-facing aspects.
To the rear a generous double bedroom offers a view of the city sky-line and is served by a neatly maintained original en suite bathroom.
Spotless presentation is a feature throughout while communal laundry facilities and under-cover car-parking are additional factors that contribute to the appeal of this exceptional entry level opportunity
Jason Sharpe : 0438 847 700
Insights: 21/57 Caroline Street, CLIFTON HILL VIC 3068 was last sold in 2009 and 12 other 1 bedroom unit in CLIFTON HILL have recently been sold.

Description:
Two bedroom garden apartment
In a peaceful location approximately 4km from Melbourne's CBD, this lovely two bedroom apartment (approx. 78 sqm) boasts an array of features including large bright living spaces, private front and rear courtyards all in peaceful garden surrounds.
Accommodation: Open plan living and dining with heating, access to the front courtyard and modern timber veneer kitchen with dishwasher. Two generous bedrooms both with mirrored built in wardrobes and access to the rear courtyard from one. Central bathroom with concealed laundry and separate toilet.
Features: Secure car space on title, low maintenance fees, full use of the landscaped garden courtyard with BBQ area, solar heated outdoor pool and golf nets. Close by is the Ramsden Street Reserve, Darling Gardens and Clifton Hill train station.
Insights: 2/5 William Street, Clifton Hill VIC 3068 was last sold in 2016 and 21 other 2 bedroom unit in Clifton Hill have recently been sold.

Description:
Charm, Style & Grace
This Victorian balcony terrace, is so inviting and offering scope to update and add further value.
Perfect urban family living or exercise the current registered rooming house permit, for maximum rent return circa $100,000pa.
Showcasing 4 bedrooms all with en-suites, ground floor bedroom also doubles as an ideal artist retreat, central bathroom, kitchen/meals with dining and family living room.
The residence features high ceilings, ornate design typical of the era, open fire places, polished timber floors, hydronic heating and air-conditioning.
Combine a tranquil courtyard/garden and ROW access for handy off street parking.
Premier lifestyle location, close to popular restaurants, cafes, bars, galleries, clothing boutiques, public transport options, bike trails and parkland.
The mixed use zoning offers the flexibility of utilising the property for medical, retail, office, Airbnb or potential further development (STCA) at the rear of the property on Harrison Place.

https://www.vic.gov.au/coronavirus-covid-19-restrictions-victoria

Description:
Timeless Terrace with Ultimate City-Edge Convenience
**Please contact us via email or phone to speak about your options to privately inspect this property. Thank you.***
***Please register your interest in this property so that we can ensure you are included in the Virtual Auction and/or contacted in the event the property is going to be sold prior to the Virtual Auction***
Retaining all the character and allure of its nineteenth century origins, this captivating Victorian provides a contemporary inner-urban sanctuary of quality and privacy thanks to its open-design interior, quality enhancements and reassuringly secure surrounds. Beyond the gorgeous facade, discover a warm and inviting interior comprising a side entrance hallway complete with towering ceilings, along with two generous bedrooms (both with built-in robes and decorative fireplaces) and updated bathroom. Bathed in northerly light, the open living/dining area is further enhanced by a tastefully-appointed kitchen featuring tiled splashbacks, integrated dishwasher and stainless steel cooking appliances. Other highlights of this period prize include split-system heating and cooling for all-seasons enjoyment, solid hardwood floors, internal laundry facilities, bi-folds (from the living area) to a secluded and a sunny courtyard with extensive paving and walkway ROW at the rear. Number 96 trams (to the CBD and St Kilda Beach) virtually at your doorstep, it's also a short stroll to the buzz of Brunswick Street, Rathdowne Village cafes and shops, as well as close proximity to the area's popular schools and the open spaces of Edinburgh Gardens.
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
If you're attending a Private Appointment, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from our team and refrain from touching any items/fixtures and doors within the property. You must wear a face mask and we will provide gloves for your appointment. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.
Insights: First listed on 28 September, this house has been on Domain for 21 days (last updated on 28 September). It was last sold in 2008 and 49 other 2 bedroom house in Fitzroy North have recently been sold.

Description:
TRANQUILLITY MEETS AFFORDABILITY
With views over the river from both levels, the tranquillity of this two level refurbished apartment feels like a bush setting, while being only 15 minutes from the heart of the CBD.
Perfectly located near the Yarra River Trail and Yarra Bend Park, the Abbotsford Convent, cafes and Victoria Park Station.
With separate kitchen area featuring gas stovetop and good storage, balconies overlooking the river off both the upstairs living and downstairs bedroom, and large separate laundry/storage area. A carpark and separate storage space also included.
This is your perfect first home or investment to add to your portfolio.
Insights: First listed on 5 October, this unit has been on Domain for 14 days (last updated on 5 October). It was last sold in 2004 and 34 other 1 bedroom unit in Abbotsford have recently been sold.

Description:
Quiet and Secluded!
Quiet and private beyond an illustrious heritage façade opposite the Royal Exhibition Building and Carlton Gardens, this brilliant 1st floor apartment presents perfect single-level style in a low-upkeep setting on the dynamic edge of the CBD. An impressive investment with a successful track-record, as an entry-level occupier's retreat or property portfolio treasure there's no better lifestyle opportunity so close to vibrant Brunswick/Gertrude Streets and the city. This fabulous apartment features entrance hall, 1 double bedroom, BIRs, light-filled living area to a secluded north-facing courtyard, ergonomic Smeg-equipped stone kitchen (induction), beautiful bathroom and European laundry, video intercom and heating/cooling.

Description:
FOR OPTIONS CURRENTLY AVAILABLE TO VIEW THE INSIDE OF THIS PROPERTY PLEASE CONTACT ANDREW LEAN 0411 871 745
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
Our office is committed to ensuring the safety of our staff and the general public, and in line with current government guidelines, we are NOT conducting open for inspections. If you have arranged a private viewing, you will be subject to strict criteria and guidelines upon attendance, including but not limited to:
- Displaying no symptoms of any kind
- Not touching any surface or hands being placed in pockets at all times
- Providing photo-ID upon entry
- Maintaining a distance of 2m from any staff member in attendance
-No children in attendance at viewings
- Lift usage restrictions
FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH ANY VERBAL INSTRUCTION BY A STAFF MEMBER WILL RESULT IN TERMINATION OF ANY PRIVATE VIEWING.
Pagan Real Estate offers you the chance to secure a stylish and convenient lifestyle in the award winning Roi complex. Located less than 4km from the CBD and just a short stroll from the St. Georges Road precinct, this chic 2 bed, 1 bath, 1 car apartment is perfect for owner-occupiers or savvy investors looking to enter the market in a trendy locale.
The light filled living space opens up to an east facing balcony with an industrial touch, looking upon the exterior wall of the old factory. With plenty of storage and bench space, the chic kitchen is perfect for culinary enthusiasts. Including an island bench-top and breakfast bar, Blanco stainless steel appliances complete this contemporary kitchen.
The main bedroom is generous in size and includes a built-in- robe, whilst the second bedroom also comes with a built-in-robe. The dual entrance bathroom rounds out this fantastic apartment with its clean, modern lines and ample storage.
Also included is a Euro-Laundry, secure swipe and intercom entry, secure underground car park, and storage cage. Residents can also enjoy the use of the community library, and rooftop garden/BBQ area in this Eco-friendly complex, which includes solar boosted hot water, and storm-water storage tanks used for irrigation of the communal garden.
With cafes, bars, restaurants, supermarkets, and walking paths only moments away, and public transport on your doorstep, this vibrant inner city village represents an outstanding opportunity close to Melbournes CBD and major universities.
Insights: 127/4 Bik Lane, Fitzroy North VIC 3068 was last sold in 2020 and 27 other 2 bedroom unit in Fitzroy North have recently been sold.

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY RENOVATED, FREESTANDING VICTORIAN IN SOUGHT AFTER POCKET OF ABBOTSFORD
- 3 bedrooms; spacious master bedroom with large built in robes and North facing balcony; 2nd bedroom with built in robes; 3rd bedroom/separate home office overlooking garden
- Light filled upstairs ensuite bathroom with dual access to master bedroom; separate bath
- Wonderfully bright & airy open plan living and dining; open fire places
- Stunning kitchen with marble bench tops, dishwasher, gas cooktop and loads of cupboards
- Downstairs newly renovated bathroom with shower; separate laundry
- North facing low maintenance courtyard garden; garden shed
- Ducted heating; reverse cycle air-conditioning
- Features polished concrete; plantation shutters
- Land size 6m x 27.6m (165sqm approx)
- Rent potential up to $950pw ($49,400pa)
Easy stroll to Collingwood and Victoria Park Stations, Gahan Reserve, The Abbotsford Convent, The Collingwood Childrens Farm, Meeri Creek and the Yarra River.
Easy access to shopping and dining in Victoria Street, Johnston Street, Smith Street and Brunswick Street. Walk to the city, MCG or ride the bike trails.
Be in the perfect pocket of Abbotsford, combining both city life and family living.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.
The information about this property has been supplied to us by the property owner, while we have no cause to doubt its accuracy, we provide no guarantee. We cannot attest to the functionality of any fixtures, fittings or inclusions to the property. Land and apartment dimensions and floor/site plans are supplied by third parties. Typing mistakes, omissions, transposing can occur, we provide to assist but make no representation. Buyers must carry out their own due diligence.
Insights: 114 Yarra Street, Abbotsford VIC 3067 was last sold in 2013 and 26 other 3 bedroom house in Abbotsford have recently been sold.
